title: Trump's ban on travel from Europe poses questions for Canada border - Toronto Sun

content: Canada and the United States conferred over the fate of their shared border one day after President Donald Trump s slammed America s door shut to foreign nationals who recently spent time in Europe to stop COVID contagion Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia chars
